Cyber Claw:




Cyber Claw kept her eyes on Dinobot. The only thing that protected her from 
disaster was the table in the War room that stood in front of her. Her 
attention came to Tavatron after she spoke.

She replied, "Ah, finally, at least you correctly identify me as my true 
self. I have returned miracleously from the Matrix to serve the Maximals 
once more. I do not recall exactly how I was brought back, but all that I 
know is that I am here." She looked around, trying not to loose track of the 
transmetal Dinobot at the other side of the room. "I suppose there is much 
to catch up on."
